entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Periods of light snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023
